import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterOutlet } from '@angular/router'; import { MenuComponent } from 'src/app/composants/menu/menu.component'; import { HeaderComponent } from 'src/app/composants/header/header.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-page-dashboard', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterOutlet, MenuComponent, HeaderComponent], templateUrl: './page-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./page-dashboard.component.scss'] }) export class PageDashboardComponent { }
